com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme

Interface Theme

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClearTheme, DoctorSwagRainbowTheme, GameSenseTheme, ThemeMultiplexer

    public interface Theme
    Interface representing a GUI theme (i.e. skin). Consists of three Renderer, that can be the same or different.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Renderer getComponentRenderer()
      Returns the renderer that should be used by components.
      Renderer getContainerRenderer()
      Returns the renderer that should be used by containers.
      Renderer getPanelRenderer()
      Returns the renderer that should be used by the root components (i.e.

    • Method Detail

      • getPanelRenderer

        Renderer getPanelRenderer()
        Returns the renderer that should be used by the root components (i.e. FixedComponent).

        Returns the renderer that should be used by containers.
        Returns:

      • getComponentRenderer

        Renderer getComponentRenderer()
        Returns the renderer that should be used by components.
